org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.ha

Class EditLogTailer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.ha.EditLogTailer

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
@InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class EditLogTailer
extends Object
    EditLogTailer represents a thread which periodically reads from edits journals and applies the transactions contained within to a given FSNamesystem.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  EditLogTailer.EditLogTailerThread
      The thread which does the actual work of tailing edits journals and applying the transactions to the FSNS.

      • lastRollTriggerTxId

        private long lastRollTriggerTxId
        The last transaction ID at which an edit log roll was initiated.

      • lastLoadedTxnId

        private long lastLoadedTxnId
        The highest transaction ID loaded by the Standby.

      • lastLoadTimeMs

        private long lastLoadTimeMs
        The last time we successfully loaded a non-zero number of edits from the shared directory.

      • logRollPeriodMs

        private final long logRollPeriodMs
        How often the Standby should roll edit logs. Since the Standby only reads from finalized log segments, the Standby will only be as up-to-date as how often the logs are rolled.

      • sleepTimeMs

        private final long sleepTimeMs
        How often the Standby should check if there are new finalized segment(s) available to be read from.
